description.arbitrum_one_is_a_layer_2_(l2)_chain_run: Arbitrum One is a Layer 2 (L2) chain running on top of Ethereum Mainnet that enables high-throughput, low cost smart contracts operations.
description.base_is_a_secure,_low-cost,_builder-frie: Base is a secure, low-cost, builder-friendly Ethereum L2 built to bring the next billion users onchain.
description.gnosis_chain_is_one_of_the_first_ethereu: Gnosis Chain is one of the first Ethereum sidechains and has stayed true to its values.
description.main_ethereum_test_network__do_not_use_f: Main Ethereum test network. Do not use for production.
description.optimism_is_a_layer_2_optimistic_rollup_: Optimism is a Layer 2 Optimistic Rollup network designed to utilize the strong security guarantees of Ethereum while reducing its cost and latency.
description.polygon_is_a_side-chain_to_build_and_sca: Polygon is a side-chain to build and scale your projects on Ethereum, the world's largest blockchain ecosystem.
description.sepolia_is_the_primary_testnet_recommend: Sepolia is the primary testnet recommended by the Ethereum community for dapp development.
description.the_original_and_most_secure_evm_network: The original and most secure EVM network. Gas fees are expensive on this network.
